mapper.insert: insert into Comment (c_index, p_index, m_id, c_writedate, c_contents, c_status, c_report, c_re_con, c_re_writedate) values (0, #{p_index}, #{m_id}, now(), #{c_contents}, 1, null, null, null);
mapper.select: select * from comment where p_index = #{p_index} order by c_index desc
mapper.update: update comment set c_re_con=#{c_re_con}, c_re_writedate=current_time where c_index=#{c_index}
update comment set c_contents=#{c_contents}, c_writedate=current_time where c_index=#{c_index}
update comment set c_contents='삭제된 댓글입니다' where c_index = #{c_index}
update comment set c_re_con=null where c_index = #{c_index}
update comment set c_re_con=#{c_re_con} where c_index = #{c_index}
update comment set c_report=#{c_report}, c_status=2 where c_index=#{c_index}
